text:
Hi all,

We have a custom cookie notice which uses the _hsq.push([‘doNotTrack’]); to prevent tracking untill the right cookies are accepted by the user. This also blocks all _anonymized_ traffic. Does anyone know a better way to implement a cookie notice that follows the EU guidelines but is not limited to HubSpot cookies (like the HubSpot cookie notice)?
Not sure if this is better.

Hi All,

I’m new developing with HubSpot and I’m not pretty sure what channel should I visit to find guidance (besides the documentation) for an integration I’m building.

The integration should be an app that gets installed by login and granting permissions and storing (in HubSpot) some parameters for furthers requests. I’ve already read the Oatuh flow and tested it with the example app but I want to do it with my company’s login page (similar to any other integration)

I appreciate any guidance on this.. I feel a little lost sometimes.

Hey, anyone had luck integrating the new Stripe customer portal into their HubSpot webpage? Looking at their integration guide, it seems impossible to me. But I'm not too experienced in either Stripe or HubSpot to say it's 100% impossible:sweat_smile:
